class_notes: First-year EPI, GLEPI, EH-EPI students only.
course_description: Prerequisite: EPI 530. The primary emphasis of this course is to gain basic knowledge and skills in designing and implementing epidemiologic studies.
prerequisites: EPI 530 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.This class is for students enrolled in the EPIMPH, or EPIMSPH, or GLEPIMPH, or GLEPIMSPH, or EOHEPIMPH plans only.
schedule_location: W 10am-11:50am in Claudia Nance Rollins AUD
